channel.title: Gamma 718 - Jump into the Patriam
channel.description:
[center][b]Introduction[/b] [i]Welcome to Gamma 718. Gamma 718 is a project that is based on the 718 Revision of RuneScape. Gamma 718 will only use all content from the 718 Revision and that revision only. It has a 718 Cache and all Definitions are for the 718 Cache so the whole project is 718 based. Our aim for this server is to have a fun, active player base who are friendly and outgoing. The server is aiming to have Skilling, PvMing, Pk-ing and Mini-games. They are the number one priority and that's what the server is based around.[/i]
[b]Links[/b] [i]Download (Link added once approved).[/i] [i]Website (Link added once approved).[/i] [i]Forums (Link added once approved).[/i] [i]Vote (Link added once approved).[/i] [i]High Scores (Link added once approved).[/i]
[b]Developers[/b] [i][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=560587]Skyro[/url][/i] [i][url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/90+tank+dds/]90 Tank DDS[/url][/i]
[b]Application Form[/b] [i]I'm looking for 2 experienced developers who know the game at this stage and who are very experience in java. I currently have 1 other developer other then myself but the official developers list will be listed once I have 4 developers including myself (Me and 3 others). If you think you have what it takes to be in this project please fill in the Application below.[/i] [code=Application Form] Name: Age: E-Mail: Skype: Java Experience: What you can bring to the Project: [/code]
[b]Change log[/b] [code] Version 1.0 (29-06-2013). - Connected the Server and Client. - Configured a base Settings. - Removed some Controllers. - Change the Home Location.
Version 1.1 (29-06-2013). - Added Charm Drops. - Added Ring of Wealth Drops. - Added Rare Drops Yell to Server.
Version 1.2 (29-06-2013). - Fixed the Client Background. - Added Donator Symbols. - Change the Client Loader.
Version 1.3 (3-07-2013). - Added and Changed some Commands. [/code]
[b]Media[/b] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/ei4j00.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: Gamma 718 - Jump into the Patriam
item.dc:creator: @jewystrength jewystrength
item.description:
@jewystrength wrote:

Name: Jon
Age: 19
E-Mail: modjdc@hotmail.com
Skype: tankdds
Java Experience: 5-6 years
What you can bring to the Project:

[ul][li]Area Manager (entering new areas)[/li]
[li]World Event manager (every 30-60 mins new event such as 2x drop rates at armadyl or 2x barrows drop rate ect.)[/li]
[li]nice and creative work, easy to understand. I have had about 7 or 8 projects 4 of which had domains 2 of those 4 had a VPS.[/li][/ul]

These include

lethium 614, 636, 642, 728
Perilscape 508
PrestigeScape 732
Eldrazi 704
Paradox 728
Project Warzone

And more but i can’t remember anything that really didn’t last long at all

Development videos:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvkNDke0AI0[/youtube]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-DnFZagdpy0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QEZtH6R5U9E
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UbwLj6L6kJE
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sppx75DjAIE
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mAUKujaCe4o
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k-VWpJw0cUE
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V8DSCnx0O4c
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=myZvlBoBke8

I have been looking for a new project and this seems perfect especially since i just got back to RSPS’s from freshening up on html, css, php, mysql and c#

Im not really on skype so just reply to the thread and ill see it

thanks, Jon

Read full topic

item.title: Gamma 718 - Jump into the Patriam
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:11, topic:523142”][quote author=WiFiZ link=topic=641692.msg4325623#msg4325623 date=1372867090]
Name: Juni Dunbar
Age: 15
E-Mail: Monique6505@hotmail.com
Skype: Swagify
Java Experience: 4 1/2 year Veteran
What you can bring to the Project: I can bring talented/AMAZING/EXTRAORDINARY content into this rsps, i know i may sound penisy, but its my truth, im willing to help as much as i possibly can and out of all theses servers i picked yours? you want to know why… ill show you if you picked me,with my intelligence with 718’s i know my way around the java.script im no little kid to it, there’s not much i can say now, let the coding speak for it’s self .
[/quote]
Declined, sorry.

May apply, maybe later.

Awesome, If you choose to, just apply here.[/quote]
Alright. I need to get my server settled and then I’ll think about joining.

Read full topic

[center]Introduction
Welcome to Gamma 718. Gamma 718 is a project that is based on the 718 Revision of RuneScape. Gamma 718 will only use all content from the 718 Revision and that revision only. It has a 718 Cache and all Definitions are for the 718 Cache so the whole project is 718 based. Our aim for this server is to have a fun, active player base who are friendly and outgoing. The server is aiming to have Skilling, PvMing, Pk-ing and Mini-games. They are the number one priority and that’s what the server is based around.
